title: Mañana Será Bonito Forever
overview: "Mañana Será Bonito Forever" is a live concert film released in 2024. The film captures the emotional finale of the global stadium tour by the Colombian superstar Karol G, which concluded on July 23, 2024. This tour was the highest-grossing Latin tour by a female artist at the time. The concert film showcases Karol G's journey through a challenging period in her personal life. The release of "Mañana Será Bonito Forever" marked the conclusion of this significant chapter in her career, symbolizing both an end and a new beginning in her artistic journey.​
